name: GNOZO: COT IKOLE
short_name: This name will show in your Windows taskbar, in the start menu, and Android homescreen
description: GNOZO is a PWA designed by developers at the academic unit at Chapel of Transformation (COT) Ikole, to foster academic success, by bridging the gap between students, especially Freshmen, and resources needed to achieve their academic goals

screenshots.description: A screenshot of the home page
